hanzi-su-wiki:
倹

Значения

Бережливый, экономный

Мнемоника

Справа — человек 人, рот 口, а также треугольник — символ единства в значении собираться вместе и горланить, «сообща». Все простые люди 亻 ввиду постоянной нужды экономны.

Варианты

儉, 俭
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiǎn
Japanese variant of 俭
Японский вариант 俭
rtega_mnemonic:
儉儉RS
俭俭		倹temperate, frugal, economical
  • persons 亻 working together 僉
heisig_constituent: frugal, person, awl, fit, meeting, umbrella, mouth, person, person2
koohiiStory1: Mr. T is as frugal as they come. He uses his one ice pick for everything: to eat, pick his teeth, clean his toilet, kill people, cook, etc.
koohiiStory2: Khatzumoto needs to be frugal after spending all his money on Japanese media and none on food. His waist has shrunk and he needs a new belt, but being frugal he just punches another hole with his awl.
jp_example_words: 倹約(けんやく): thrift, economy, frugality
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader squid tells all of its squid people to be thrifty.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the leader squid giving a speech about how you shouldn't buy new things, and how you should live with a roommate to save money. Every squid yen counts!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Who is a thrifty squid? Ken (けん) the samurai's squid buddy, who gets carried around in a bucket and never pays rent.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
Ken's squid is always shaking his head at Ken the samurai's obsession with wearing all silk. He should visit Thrifty Threads, the second hand shop, and get some cotton clothes that would do the job just fine.
Hint: Whenever there's a squid, remember that Ken (けん) the samurai is nearby.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 検 (しらべる、ケン изучение), 倹 (つましい、ケン бережливость), 険 (けわしい、ケン опасный, трудный)
Ru_Radicals: 人 (человек), 化 (превращаться), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 口 (рот)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: we're unanimous (㑒) that the man (亻) is thrifty

jiǎn
яп. вм. 俭
Radicals: ｲ  (leader, squid)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader squid tells all of its squid people to be thrifty.
Imagine the leader squid giving a speech about how you shouldn't buy new things, and how you should live with a roommate to save money. Every squid yen counts!
Reading Mnemonic
Who is a thrifty squid? Ken (けん) the samurai's squid buddy, who gets carried around in a bucket and never pays rent.
Ken's squid is always shaking his head at Ken the samurai's obsession with wearing all silk. He should visit Thrifty Threads, the second hand shop, and get some cotton clothes that would do the job just fine.
Hint: Whenever there's a squid, remember that Ken (けん) the samurai is nearby.
